title: Prez Mahama Is Winning One Touch...Visibility Of Projects Is Like Snowfall During Winter - Kofi Adams
text:
Politics | 15 October 2015 19:54 CET Prez Mahama Is Winning One Touch...Visibility Of Projects Is Like Snowfall During Winter - Kofi Adams Source: Peacefmonline.com 
The visibility of President John Dramani Mahama’s fulfilled promises are akin to snow falling during a winter period asserts National Organiser of the ruling National Democratic Congress (NDC), Kofi Adams. 
According to him, the developmental projects being embarked on by the President are speaking volumes for itself when the ruling party toured Western, Central and other regions. 
Speaking on Okay Fm ’s Ade Akye Abia Morning Show, Kofi Adams intimated President Mahama will win one touch due to his appreciable projects in the various regions in the country. 
He mentioned that all the chiefs and their people in the areas visited attested to the projects being carried out in their communities; and strongly held that the commendations from the residents in those areas are indicative of a one touch victory for President Mahama in next year's polls. 
“ ...the chiefs in Central region are happy to see the Komenda Sugar Factory and the Kotokuraba Market ready for use…of course I am convinced that President Mahama will win one touch in 2016 elections ,” he stated. 
Cataloguing a litany of projects being carried in the Central region, Kofi Adams noted that the construction of Cape Coast Stadium and the Kasoa Interchange coupled with the various water projects in the rural areas and the constructions of the cocoa roads will translate into votes for the NDC. 
" ....President Mahama will win one touch...2016 is a done deal for the NDC...the President has fulfilled all promises and is still even working hard to transform lives in the country ," he added.
